title: Check out Base UI today ðŸ’¥
text: Love Material UI, but don't need Material Design? Try Base UI, the new "unstyled" alternative. Read more in this announcement.

title: Introducing MUI X v6.0.0
text: Explore what's new and what's next in the new stable version of the advanced components.

title: Try the new time picker UI now
text: The new time-picking experience is designed for desktops, and it's available in the Time Picker as well as a standalone component.

title: Unveiling Charts: Alpha release is live
text: We're starting with bars, lines, and scatter charts. Try X Charts now, and let us know what you need.

title: MUI Toolpad is now in Beta
text: Import in your codebase, connect to datasources and build your UI in minutes! Read our Beta announcement, try toolpad and share your feedback.
